comment.author: 29910820@N06
comment._content: This one is probably Boeing Y1B-9 (model 214). What is interesting, the logo on the fuselage indicates the installation of some Wright engine  (e.g. Cyclone R-1820-19 or -25), although no confirmation can be found in my sources.

comment.author: 62818791@N00
comment._content: That logo is for the USAAC testing facility at Wright Field not Wright aircraft engines.
